requireProject.title: No Active Project
requireProject.description: Please create or select a project to continue.

common.formError: An error occurred while submitting the form

menu.titleHelp: A name to identify this menu in the editor.
menu.descriptionHelp: Optional notes about where this menu is used.

page.titleHelp: The title shown in the browser tab and search results.
page.filenameHelp: The name of the HTML file that will be created.
page.metaDescriptionHelp: A short summary shown in search results (150-160 characters).
page.socialTitleHelp: Custom title when shared on Facebook, Twitter, etc.
page.socialImageHelp: Image shown when shared on social media (1200×630px).
page.canonicalUrlHelp: The preferred URL for this page if it exists elsewhere.
page.robotsHelp: Controls if search engines can find this page.

project.titleHelp: The display name for your project.
project.folderNamePattern: Folder name can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
project.folderNameHelp: The folder name where your project will be saved and exported.
project.descriptionHelp: Add notes about your project for your own reference.
project.themeHelp: The theme determines the styling and available widgets for your site.
project.siteUrlHelp: The URL of your live website (e.g., https://mysite.com).
project.siteUrlInvalid: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., https://mysite.com)
project.loadThemesError: Failed to load themes. Please restart the application.

media.titleHelp: Sets the title attribute (often shown on hover).

placeholders.audioDescription: Artist, album, or notes about this audio
placeholders.videoDescription: Description or notes about this video

help.audioTitle: The title of the audio track or podcast episode.
help.audioDescription: Optional notes about this audio file (artist, album, etc.).
help.videoDescription: Optional description or notes about this video.

common.confirmProceed: Are you sure you want to proceed?

mediaUploader.dropInactive: Drag and drop images and videos here or

mediaUploader.supportedVideos: Videos: MP4, WebM, MOV, AVI, MKV

fileUploader.clickOrDrop: Click to upload or drag and drop

mediaSelector.title: Select Media
mediaSelector.noMatch: No media files match your search
mediaSelector.uploaderDesc: Select files to add to your library

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.readyToCreate: Ready to create your first project!

projects.title: Projects
projects.noActiveProjectDesc: Time to create your next big thing!
projects.noProjects: No projects yet. Create your first project!

toasts.cannotDeleteActive: Cannot delete the active project. Please set another project as active first.

deleteModal.title: Delete Project
deleteModal.message:
Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

This will permanently delete:
• All project files and pages
• All uploaded media
• All exported versions
• All project settings

This action cannot be undone.

emptyState.title: No widgets yet
emptyState.description: Start building your page by adding widgets from the sidebar

pages.title: Pages
pages.noPagesMatch: No pages match "{{term}}". Try a different search term.
pages.createFirstPage: Create your first page to get started.

deleteModal.title: Delete Page
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
deleteModal.messageBulk: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} page? This action cannot be undone.
deleteModal.messageBulk_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} pages? This action cannot be undone.

menus.title: Menus
menus.noMenus: No menus yet. Create your first menu!

deleteModal.title: Delete Menu
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

menuStructure.title: Edit Menu Structure
menuStructure.description: You can add up to 3 levels of menu items.

pageEditor.noPageSelected: No page selected. Please select a page from the Pages list.

widgetName.label: Widget Name
widgetName.description: Optional custom name to identify this widget instance

settingsPanel.emptyState: Select a widget to edit its settings

toasts.updateSuccessUrlChanged: Page "{{name}}" was updated successfully and URL was changed.

toasts.createActiveSuccess: Project "{{name}}" was created and set as active

projectsEdit.title: Edit project
projectsEdit.noActiveProjectDesc: Please select or create a project to manage your projects.

toasts.updateSuccessRenamed: Project "{{name}}" was updated successfully and folder was renamed.
toasts.noActiveProject: Please select or create a project to manage your projects

creator.title: Create New Export
creator.description: Click the button below to generate a static HTML version of your site for export. Each export is assigned a version number for easy tracking.

deleteModal.title: Delete Export
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete export version {{version}}? This action cannot be undone.

toasts.noProjectId: Active project ID is not available.
toasts.exportError: Exporting failed with an unknown issue.
toasts.unknownError: An unknown error occurred during exporting.

media.title: Media
media.emptyDesc: Upload some files using the uploader above.

uploader.title: Upload Media
uploader.description: Drag and drop images or videos to upload them to your project library

toasts.loadError: Failed to load theme settings. Please try again.
toasts.saveError: Failed to save theme settings. Please try again.

themes.title: Themes
themes.dropZoneActive: Drop the theme zip file here...
themes.dropZoneInactive: Drag & drop your theme zip file here, or click to select file

uploader.title: Upload Theme
uploader.description: Drag and drop a .zip file to install a new theme

themes.emptyDesc: Upload a theme using the area above to get started

toasts.singleFileError: Please upload a single zip file.

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.emptyDesc: Get started by installing your first plugin from the store or uploading a custom plugin.

media.label: Media & Upload
media.description: Configure file upload limits and media processing

export.label: Export & Versioning
export.description: Manage export settings and version control

language.label: Language
language.description: Select the language for the admin interface

dateFormat.label: Date Format
dateFormat.description: Choose the default date format for displaying dates throughout the application

maxFileSizeMB.label: Max Image Upload Size (MB)
maxFileSizeMB.description: Set the maximum size for individual image uploads across all projects.

maxVideoSizeMB.label: Max Video Upload Size (MB)
maxVideoSizeMB.description: Set the maximum size for individual video uploads across all projects.

maxAudioSizeMB.label: Max Audio Upload Size (MB)
maxAudioSizeMB.description: Set the maximum size for individual audio (MP3) uploads across all projects.

quality.label: Image Quality
quality.description: Quality setting for all generated image sizes (1-100). Higher values mean better quality but larger file sizes.

enabled.label: Enable Thumbnails
enabled.description: Generate thumbnail versions of uploaded images

enabled.label: Enable Small Images
enabled.description: Generate small versions of uploaded images

enabled.label: Enable Medium Images
enabled.description: Generate medium versions of uploaded images

enabled.label: Enable Large Images
enabled.description: Generate large versions of uploaded images

maxVersionsToKeep.label: Max Export Versions to Keep
maxVersionsToKeep.description: Maximum number of export versions to keep per project. When this limit is exceeded, the oldest exports are automatically deleted to save storage space.
